channel.title: New Gamemode Idea
channel.description:
Simple - a mode with Neutral classes completely disabled.
I would play this over the normal mode any day of the week, and I'm sure I can't be the only one.
Obviously this should be a seperate gamemode that you can choose, I wouldn't force this onto players when the Neutral roles already exist in the normal game.

item.title: New Gamemode Idea
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Allow more converts, and if they still need a buff start with MM/Assn/Random Unseen or CL and two random Cult

Bam easy

Read full topic

item.title: New Gamemode Idea
item.dc:creator: anon98616575
item.description:
I like this idea orange, but consider the balance changes needed.

Blue Dragon is INSANELY powerful, and can find most evils quickly. The Neutral Killer in each game is what the Unseen/Cult needs for them to have a chance at winning.

Read full topic

item.title: New Gamemode Idea
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
So what you do is raise the cap, duh

4 Unseen and 5 Cult or something

Obviously this would play differently, that’s the point

Read full topic

item.title: New Gamemode Idea
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I find In general neutral players tend to benefit the evil teams more , particularly neutral killers for example .
They also tend to add some mayhem to the game .
Id be intrested to try a neuts free game , but my gut is id prefer the games with #neutsin!

Read full topic
